Name: MokMok
About the game: MokMok is a musical adventure. A unique experience set in a bizarre world, inhabited by MokÂ´s - living musical instruments . Discover the quirky creatures of MokMok. Get Episode 1 today and experience music like never before. MokMok is made by 2Beats with love.
